text: The area of Sōya Districts in Sōya Subprefecture. is a district located in Sōya Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. As of 2004, the district has an estimated population of 2,925 and a density of 4.96 persons per km². The total area is 590.00 km². ==Towns and villages== *Sarufutsu Category:Districts in Hokkaido
title: Sōya District, Hokkaido
